sections.heading: to 62-7-10 - Repealed.Section 62-7-11 to 62-7-23 - Terminated.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1984, ch. 123, § 13A, repealed 62-7-1 through 62-7-10 NMSA 1978, the Natural Gas Pricing Act, effective July 1, 1984.

sections.heading: to 62-7-23 - Terminated.
sections.text: Termination dates.— Laws 1984, ch. 123, § 15, terminated 62-7-11 to 62-7-23 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1984, ch. 123, the Natural Gas Price Protection Act, effective June 30, 1985.
